pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Body Wash for Acne 300ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Tea Tree Body Wash for acne with refreshing lemongrass. Helps prevent acne and pimples on the body.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Body Wash for Acne is a soap-free face and body wash containing 100% pure antibacterial Australian Tea Tree Oil that cleanses and purifies skin to help prevent the occurrence of acne and pimples and maintain clearer looking skin. The added pure lemograss oil delivers a refreshing sensation

Size: 300mL

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Soap-Free?: Yes

PABA Free?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Shelf Life in Days: 730

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• 95% naturally derived
• contains 100% pure tea tree oil
• cleanse and purify skin
• helps prevents occurence of acne and pimples
• with refreshing lemongrass oil
• vegan friendly

Warnings

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use. If sensitivity occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Decyl Glucoside, Coco-Betaine, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cymbopogon Flexuosus Oil, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Peel Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract. Contains Limonene, Citral.

Contains: 95% naturally derived ingredients

Directions

Wet skin and apply to the body to create lather. Rinse thoroughly.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a dry place below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
